title: 95/434/EC: Commission Decision of 13 October 1995 on the list of programmes for the eradication and monitoring of animal diseases qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1996
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 October 1995 on  the list of programmes for the eradication and monitoring of animal diseases qualifying for a  financial contribution from the Community in 1996 (Text with EEA relevance) (95/434/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1.  The programmes listed in the Annex hereto shall qualify for a  financial contribution from the Community in 1996.
2.  For each programme as referred to in paragraph 1, the proposed rate and amount of the Community  financial contribution shall be set out in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 October 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
List of programmes - Proposed rate and amount of the Community financial  contribution
>TABLE>
